author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
MARVEL Cosmic Invasion launches December 1st on Steam, Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation and Xbox consoles!

Play the Steam demo and wishlist it now: https://marvelcosmicinvasiongame.com/

Join Yannick Belzil, Narrative Designer at Tribute Games, as he dives into the comics that inspired MARVEL Cosmic Invasion!

Yannick’s Must-Read list:
- Annihilation Omnibus - Trade Paperback (2022)
- Guardians of the Galaxy (2008-2010)
- Avengers by Busiek & Perez Omnibus Vol. 1 - Trade Paperback (2023)
- Beta Ray Bill (2021)
- X-Men: Mutant Genesis 2.0 - Trade Paperback (2016)
- X-Men: The Dark Phoenix Saga (2012)
- Black Panther: A Nation Under Our Feet (2016)
- True Believers: Absolute Carnage - Maximum Carnage (2019)
- She-Hulk (2022-2023) & Sensational She-Hulk (2023-2024)


For more MARVEL Cosmic Invasion updates, join us on social media:
X / Twitter: https://x.com/MARVELCosmicInv
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MARVELCosmicInvasion
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/KSq4P8N
title: Dev Diaries Episode 4: Must-Read List | MARVEL Cosmic Invasion
